title: Add a delay before you can cancel Wukong's ulti
body:
Hi all,

Reposting since there was a typo in the title of my last post.

Anyway, as the title says, to prevent Wukong's ulti from cancelling immediately due to spamming the R key. This change will bring his ulti in line with similar mechanics in the game such as:

Potion spamming
Cancelling teleport
Garen's spin
Mao's ulti.

These all have a delay before you can "reactivate" them.

Cheers,
S

replies.body: I main wukong and have never had this problem, you must be doing something wrong.
Cool, then this change won't affect you.
There wont be a change, because there is no problem
